selected_skills.name: identify_objects_in_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To identify and categorize objects in the diagram, specifically to locate and interpret angle H.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash and criteria for identifying angles to extract relevant information about angle H.

new_skill_specs.name: interpret_angle_measurement
new_skill_specs.purpose: Interpret the angle measurement from the diagram and map it to one of the provided multiple-choice options.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the correct multiple-choice option.
